page.title: 14HOUSES AND SHOPS IN BEAULIEU
page.content: Beaulieu is a well known tourist village. It is well known for its MOTOR MUSEUM.There are fourteen private houses, one is called PEPPER-BOX HOUSE.There is a restaurant called MONTAGUE ARMS and a pub(public house)called SPATTS BAR.LLOYDS BANK,is the only bank in Beaulieu Village .The MOTOR MUSEUM is owned by LORD MONTAGUE and it quite nice in there.As you go into Bealieu there is a road and at the end of the road there is a fire station. There are seven shops,a post office/newsagents selling sweets ect,Norris Shop, an ex-butchers shop,an art shop and a craft shop. There is a building contractors called Gambles Building Contractors and it is dated 1757.
